channel.title: [742] VyreScape RSPS - Grand Opening November 1st - Pure 742 - Custom XP Rates
channel.description:
[center][img]http://vyrescape.com/files/images/bigBanner.gif[/img]
[b] - Important Links[/b]
[url=http://vyrescape.com]Landing[/url] - [url=http://vyrescape.com/forum]Forums[/url] - [url=http://vyrescape.com/files/Launcher.jar]Play Now[/url]
[b] - VyreScape RSPS[/b] VyreScape RSPS is a runescape private server based on the 2013 era of Runescape. It is completely free to play and offers some of the most unique and highest quality gameplay in runescape private server history. We have been online since April 2012 and have shown no signs of slowing down. We offer high quality, bug-free minigames, all functional skills, loads of bosses, grand exchange, clue scrolls, veteran capes, loyalty system, dwarf cannons, and much more. Our community is constantly growing, and our staff team is always active and willing to help you through your adventure. We are always improving VyreScape RSPS, with frequent game and website updates coming from professional developers. We like to brag (and have proof to back it up) that VyreScape RSPS is one of the best 2015 runescape private server communities still alive today. - So, what are you waiting for...? Join hundreds of others - Become the best!
[b] - Top Features[/b] * First ever pure 742 revision runescape private server * Frequent game and website updates * Stable economy, player based grand exchange * Over a dozen training grounds for quicker leveling * Unique job system for faster money making * Known for our PvM, with over 20 bosses and counting * Flawless drop system (similar to runescape) with easy to manage drop rate editor * Unique PvP aspects such as wilderness chests and several wilderness bosses * A dozen minigames, including a flawless dueling system * All skills fully functional * Achievements: Completionists, Max, Veteran * Full clan system, with lootshare and coinshare * World events such as trivia, boss spawns and more * Co-op slayer system with over 200 tasks * Elite slayer system (boss slayer tasks) * Over 75 clue scrolls implemented * Master (120) capes, best models on the market * All three dwarf multicannons * Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping * Massive donor zone with several dozens extra features
[b]- Server Media[/b] [spoiler=Pictures] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YkgS2ym.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/I34AYWR.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4SPg0ZJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l1ARWiB.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/t9sBJ7c.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/a2cKIsa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7i0KuT1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/h8uJNaD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W7lV14s.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/usNwKvo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/41l2fty.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xScLZWF.jpg[/img][/spoiler][/center]

item.dc:creator: @adoom35 adoom35
item.description:
@adoom35 wrote:

Been with this server for a LONG LONG time, it’s gone through many bad spots but the owner has always pulled through. The server and many if it’s features are very enjoyable to play, the server is smooth, still small things to fix here and there, but nothing the owner can’t solve.

Highly recommend coming to have a look! ;D

item.title: [742] VyreScape RSPS - Grand Opening November 1st - Pure 742 - Custom XP Rates
item.dc:creator: @FrozenArrow123 FrozenArrow123
item.description:
@FrozenArrow123 wrote:

This server is really extraordinary. A clean 742, not some 718/7** crap. I didn’t think anyone would make all matrix content this compatible with a 742, but Vichy has done that, and it looks amazing. I definitely support this server and believe it will become large in no time. Keep up the good work, Vich.

Aye, I’m sorry.

OT: Been pushing out massive updates this week. Player-owned houses and Cooperative Slayer being the biggest ones!

Come check us out :).

item.title: [742] VyreScape RSPS - Grand Opening November 1st - Pure 742 - Custom XP Rates
item.dc:creator: @VichYi VichYi
item.description:
@VichYi wrote:

[center]

- Important Links

Landing - Forums - Play Now

- VyreScape RSPS
VyreScape RSPS is a runescape private server based on the 2013 era of Runescape.
It is completely free to play and offers some of the most unique and highest quality gameplay in runescape private server history.
We have been online since April 2012 and have shown no signs of slowing down.
We offer high quality, bug-free minigames, all functional skills, loads of bosses, grand exchange, clue scrolls, veteran capes, loyalty system, dwarf cannons, and much more.
Our community is constantly growing, and our staff team is always active and willing to help you through your adventure.
We are always improving VyreScape RSPS, with frequent game and website updates coming from professional developers.
We like to brag (and have proof to back it up) that VyreScape RSPS is one of the best 2015 runescape private server communities still alive today.

  • So, what are you waiting for…? Join hundreds of others - Become the best!

- Top Features
* First ever pure 742 revision runescape private server
* Frequent game and website updates
* Stable economy, player based grand exchange
* Over a dozen training grounds for quicker leveling
* Unique job system for faster money making
* Known for our PvM, with over 20 bosses and counting
* Flawless drop system (similar to runescape) with easy to manage drop rate editor
* Unique PvP aspects such as wilderness chests and several wilderness bosses
* A dozen minigames, including a flawless dueling system
* All skills fully functional
* Achievements: Completionists, Max, Veteran
* Full clan system, with lootshare and coinshare
* World events such as trivia, boss spawns and more
* Co-op slayer system with over 200 tasks
* Elite slayer system (boss slayer tasks)
* Over 75 clue scrolls implemented
* Master (120) capes, best models on the market
* All three dwarf multicannons
* Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping
* Massive donor zone with several dozens extra features

- Server Media
